event.title: 1st International Congress on Democratic Digital Education and Open Edtech. Barcelona 12-13-14 July 2022 in Barcelona, Spain

body.p: Lina Ceballos; FSFE Project Manager, and Alexander Sander; FSFE Policy Consultant, will participate in the 1st International Congress on Democratic Digital Education and Open Edtech that will take place in Barcelona Spain. On Wednesday 13th of July at 16:00CEST, they will join the panel: First was the code: Digital Rights, Auditanility, Interoperability in Education, in which DD and relevant international experiences of open source software present their work.

On Thursday 14th of July from 10:00 to 15:00 CEST, Lina and Alexander will join the DevRoom in which the current DD tool will be explained and analysed, and it will be discussed at a technical level how it can evolve to become a scalable and sustainable tool.
The event will take place in Spanish and English with available translation.
